title: uploading any file on 4.5.2 leads to inaccessible service
body:
i just updated from 4.5.1a to 4.5.2. now when i upload any file, via any upload method, the spinning wheel doesn't stop, and upon reload i only get an empty page. error.log shows (i substituted the domain name):

php fatal error:  uncaught exception 'pdoexception' with message
'sqlstate[42703]: undefined column: 7 error:  column "/shared" does not
exist\nline 1: delete from "oc_properties" where "propertypath" = "/shared"\n
^' in /var/www/example.com/htdocs/owncloud/lib/db.php:738\nstack trace:\n#0
/var/www/example.com/htdocs/owncloud/lib/db.php(738): pdostatement->execute()\n#1
/var/www/example.com/htdocs/owncloud/lib/connector/sabre/node.php(283):
pdostatementwrapper->execute(array)\n#2
/var/www/example.com/htdocs/owncloud/lib/filesystem.php(569):
oc_connector_sabre_node::removeetagpropertyforpath('/test')\n#3 [internal
function]: oc_filesystem::removeetaghook(array)\n#4
/var/www/example.com/htdocs/owncloud/lib/hook.php(62): call_user_func(array,
array)\n#5 /var/www/example.com/htdocs/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php(104):
oc_hook::emit('oc_filesystem', 'post_write', array)\n#6
/var/www/example.com/htdocs/owncloud/lib/filecache.php(258):
oc_filecache_update::updatefolder('/test', false)\n#7 /var/www/ in
/var/www/example.com/htdocs/owncloud/lib/db.php on line 738, referer:
https://example.com/owncloud/?app=files

i had and have the shared app enabled. disabling it now doesn't help.

deleting the file directly on the server in the data directory does help most of the time, but not always.
